name: Running Knight
description: This is an endless runner type of game. The theme I chose is 16-bit, black and white pixel art. All graphical stuff is done by me, although music and sound effects are from Royalty Free 8-Bit Background Music Downloads | FStudios. The knight here runs endlessly in hopes of finding his girlfriend, however never succeeds. Who knows maybe you can save him from this endless cycle of pain? (Sorry, you cant :(. This question was for literary purposes only, and is not a hint. But game is still fun and you should really give it a go)
